1.desc: This ship has recently suffered fatal damage. TRP, ASW, AVI, AA, and EVA are reduced by 60%. This status can be removed by repairing at a harbor or through the Fleet Deployment command.
1.name: Tolls of War

2.desc: The fleet has been affected by a Siren jamming attack, and cannot continuously move long distances.
2.name: Siren Jamming

200.desc: Your fleet is suffering from low Resolve. FP, TRP, ASW, AVI, AA, and EVA are reduced by 10%. This status can be removed by winning a battle or through the Regroup and Rest command.
200.name: Low Resolve I

201.desc: Your fleet is suffering from low Resolve. FP, TRP, ASW, AVI, AA, and EVA are reduced by 30%. This status can be removed by winning a battle or through the Regroup and Rest command.
201.name: Low Resolve II

202.desc: Your fleet is suffering from low Resolve. FP, TRP, ASW, AVI, AA, and EVA are reduced by 60%. This status can be removed by winning a battle or through the Regroup and Rest command.
202.name: Low Resolve III

301.desc: Electromagnetic interference has affected the navigation system’s display. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
301.name: Anomaly: EM Interference

302.desc: The fleet is trapped in a whirlpool, and movements have a chance to fail.
302.name: Anomaly: Maelstrom

303.desc: The burning sea is damaging your fleet’s rigging, dealing damage each time the fleet moves. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
303.name: Anomaly: Burning Seas

304.desc: A Siren EMP attack has knocked the navigation system offline, rendering the fleet unable to accurately navigate to its desired location.
304.name: Anomaly: EMP Disturbance

305.desc: The navigation system has been affected by a Siren EMP attack, and the movement range of each action is reduced.
305.name: Anomaly: Restricted Movement

306.desc: Many pieces of ship equipment have been frozen, drastically reducing combat performance. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
306.name: Anomaly: Sheer Cold

307.desc: The navigation system has been affected by a Siren EMP attack, and the movement range of each action is reduced.
307.name: Anomaly: Restricted Movement

308.desc: The burning sea is damaging your fleet’s rigging, dealing damage each time the fleet moves. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
308.name: Anomaly: Burning Seas

309.desc: A Siren EMP attack has knocked the navigation system offline, rendering the fleet unable to accurately navigate to its desired location.
309.name: Anomaly: EMP Disturbance

310.desc: The navigation system has been affected by a Siren EMP attack, and the movement range of each action is reduced.
310.name: Anomaly: Restricted Movement

311.desc: A Siren EMP attack has knocked the navigation system offline, rendering the fleet unable to accurately navigate to its desired location.
311.name: Anomaly: EMP Disturbance

312.desc: The navigation system has been affected by a Siren EMP attack, and the movement range of each action is reduced.
312.name: Anomaly: Restricted Movement

313.desc: Electromagnetic interference has affected the navigation system’s display. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
313.name: Anomaly: EM Interference

314.desc: Electromagnetic interference has severely affected the navigation system’s display. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
314.name: Anomaly: Strong EM Interference

315.desc: The burning sea is damaging your fleet’s rigging, dealing damage each time the fleet moves. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
315.name: Anomaly: Burning Seas

316.desc: Many pieces of ship equipment have been frozen, drastically reducing combat performance. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
316.name: Anomaly: Sheer Cold

317.desc: The fleet is trapped in a whirlpool, and movements have a chance to fail.
317.name: Anomaly: Maelstrom

318.desc: The navigation system has been affected by fluctuations in radio waves, making it difficult to navigate the fleet in the right direction.
318.name: Anomaly: Radio Distortion

320.desc: The burning sea is damaging your fleet’s rigging, dealing damage each time the fleet moves. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
320.name: Anomaly: Blazing Seas

321.desc: Electromagnetic interference has affected the navigation system’s display. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
321.name: Anomaly: EM Interference

322.desc: The fleet is trapped in a whirlpool, and movements have a chance to fail.
322.name: Anomaly: Maelstrom

323.desc: The burning sea is damaging your fleet’s rigging, dealing damage each time the fleet moves. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
323.name: Anomaly: Burning Seas

324.desc: A Siren EMP attack has knocked the navigation system offline, rendering the fleet unable to accurately navigate to its desired location.
324.name: Anomaly: EMP Disturbance

325.desc: The navigation system has been affected by a Siren EMP attack, and the movement range of each action is reduced.
325.name: Anomaly: Restricted Movement

326.desc: Many pieces of ship equipment have been frozen, drastically reducing combat performance. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
326.name: Anomaly: Sheer Cold

401.desc: By analyzing the Sirens’ enhancement modules and tuning our ships’ rigging accordingly, the effective attack power of enemy ships will be decreased.
401.name: Adaptive Tuning - Offense

402.desc: By analyzing the Sirens’ enhancement modules and tuning our ships’ rigging accordingly, the effective HP of enemy ships will be decreased.
402.name: Adaptive Tuning - Survivability

403.desc: By analyzing the Sirens’ enhancement modules and tuning our ships’ rigging accordingly, we can mitigate the Sirens’ healing interference effects.
403.name: Adaptive Tuning - Tactics

600.desc: The navigation system has been affected by a Siren EMP attack, and the movement range of each action is reduced.
600.name: Anomaly: Restricted Movement

601.desc: A Siren EMP attack has knocked the navigation system offline, rendering the fleet unable to accurately navigate to its desired location.
601.name: Anomaly: EMP Disturbance

610.desc: You are being targeted by an unknown device. Gravitational traps will periodically appear around your fleets.
610.name: Gazer Module Type VIII

620.desc: You are being targeted by an unknown device. Electronic interference traps will periodically appear around your fleets and jam them if entered.
620.name: Gazer Module Type XIV

630.desc: You are being targeted by an unknown device. Tiles with abnormal weather conditions will periodically appear around your fleets.
630.name: Gazer Module Type IX

700.desc: Your allies will provide supporting volley fire.
700.name: Volley Fire Support

710.desc: Your allies will provide supporting airstrikes.
710.name: Airstrike Support

1010.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased FP.
1010.name: Firepower Boost

1020.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased TRP.
1020.name: Torpedo Boost

1030.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased AA.
1030.name: Anti-Air Boost

1040.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased AVI.
1040.name: Aviation Boost

1050.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased RLD.
1050.name: Reload Boost

1060.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 30% increased Movement Speed.
1060.name: Speed Boost

1110.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 50.0% reduced damage from shelling.
1110.name: Shelling Resistance

1120.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 50.0% reduced damage from torpedoes.
1120.name: Torpedo Resistance

1130.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 50.0% reduced damage from airstrikes.
1130.name: Airstrike Resistance

1210.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 30.0% increased damage from shelling.
1210.name: Shelling Vulnerability I

1220.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 50.0% increased damage from shelling.
1220.name: Shelling Vulnerability II

1230.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 100.0% increased damage from shelling.
1230.name: Shelling Vulnerability III

1240.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 30.0% increased damage from torpedoes.
1240.name: Torpedo Vulnerability I

1250.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 50.0% increased damage from torpedoes.
1250.name: Torpedo Vulnerability II

1260.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 100.0% increased damage from torpedoes.
1260.name: Torpedo Vulnerability III

1270.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 30.0% increased damage from airstrikes.
1270.name: Airstrike Vulnerability I

1280.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 50.0% increased damage from airstrikes.
1280.name: Airstrike Vulnerability II

1290.desc: The enemy Flagship takes 100.0% increased damage from airstrikes.
1290.name: Airstrike Vulnerability III

1300.desc: The enemy Flagship deals 30.0% increased damage to your ships.
1300.name: Hunting Protocol

1310.desc: The enemy Flagship deals 50.0% increased damage to your Vanguard Fleet.
1310.name: Vanguard Fleet Hunter

1320.desc: The enemy Flagship deals 50.0% increased damage to your Main Fleet.
1320.name: Main Fleet Hunter

1410.desc: After the enemy Flagship enters the battle, your ships will be damaged for 5% of their Max HP every 10s.
1410.name: Ruination Module

1420.desc: After the enemy Flagship enters the battle, it will gain +10% to all stats every 10s, up to a maximum of 5 stacks.
1420.name: Pluripotency Module

1430.desc: Every 20s, the enemy Flagship will generate a shield that can absorb 20% of its Max HP, lasting for 5s.
1430.name: Shield Module: Vitality Surge

1440.desc: Every 20s, the enemy Flagship will generate a shield that reduces the probability of receiving critical hits by 100% for 10s.
1440.name: Shield Module: Critical Defense

1450.desc: Every 20s, the enemy Flagship will generate a shield that changes the attack damage it receives to 1. The shield can deflect a maximum of 15 attacks and lasts for 8s.
1450.name: Shield Module: Damage Deflection

1460.desc: When the enemy Flagship’s HP falls under 30%, FP and TRP are increased by 100% until the end of battle.
1460.name: Firepower Overdrive

1470.desc: When the enemy Flagship’s HP falls under 30%, it will gain a 50% chance of reducing incoming shelling damage to 1 until the end of battle.
1470.name: Armor Overdrive

1480.desc: When the enemy Flagship’s HP falls under 30%, it will heal for 5% of its Max HP every 3s for 15s. Activates only once per battle.
1480.name: Repair Overdrive

1490.desc: When the enemy Flagship’s HP falls under 30%, it will gain a permanent shield that can block incoming bullets.
1490.name: Shield Overdrive

1500.desc: While the enemy Flagship is afloat, all heals your ships receive will instead be converted into damage.
1500.name: Healing Reversal

1510.desc: While the enemy Flagship is afloat, all heals your ships receive will instead heal the enemy Flagship.
1510.name: Healing Siphon

1520.desc: While the enemy Flagship is afloat, each time your ships deal a Crit, your fleet loses A% Crit Rate, and the enemy Flagshin gains B% increased Crit Rate for D s (stacks up to C times).
1520.name: Critical Siphon

1530.desc: After the enemy Flagship has dealt 5 instances of damage to your ship, the next instance of damage dealt to that ship is increased to 300%.
1530.name: Penetration

1540.desc: After the enemy Flagship has dealt 5 instances of damage to your ship, the next instance of damage dealt to that ship will slow its Movement Speed by 70%.
1540.name: Crippling Strikes

1550.desc: Each time the enemy Flagship deals damage to your ship, that ship will take 10 additional damage from subsequent attacks.
1550.name: Aftershock

1560.desc: The enemy Flagship has greatly increased accuracy.
1560.name: Precision

2000.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 30.0% increased FP.
2000.name: Firepower Boost

2010.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased FP.
2010.name: Firepower Boost

2020.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 100.0% increased FP.
2020.name: Firepower Boost

2100.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 30.0% increased TRP.
2100.name: Torpedo Boost

2110.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased TRP.
2110.name: Torpedo Boost

2120.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 100.0% increased TRP.
2120.name: Torpedo Boost

2200.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 30.0% increased AA.
2200.name: Anti-Air Boost

2210.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased AA.
2210.name: Anti-Air Boost

2220.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 100.0% increased AA.
2220.name: Anti-Air Boost

2300.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 30.0% increased AVI.
2300.name: Aviation Boost

2310.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased AVI.
2310.name: Aviation Boost

2320.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 100.0% increased AVI.
2320.name: Aviation Boost

2400.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 30.0% increased RLD.
2400.name: Reload Boost

2410.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 50.0% increased RLD.
2410.name: Reload Boost

2420.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 100.0% increased RLD.
2420.name: Reload Boost

2500.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 30% increased Movement Speed.
2500.name: Speed Boost

2510.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 30% increased Movement Speed.
2510.name: Speed Boost

2520.desc: The enemy Flagship gains 100% increased Movement Speed.
2520.name: Speed Boost

4000.desc: Arbiter: Temperance XIV is assisted by a Combat Module during battle. As long as the Combat Module persists: Temperance deals 15.0% increased DMG and takes 10.0% less DMG; when the Combat Module is destroyed: Temperance takes 10.0% increased DMG until the battle ends.
4000.name: Autonomous Combat Module

4010.desc:
A special barrier deployed by Arbiter: Strength VIII during combat.
While the barrier is in effect, Arbiter: Strength VIII takes 25.0% decreased DMG from shelling and airstrikes, but will also inflict 15.0% less DMG.
The barrier can absorb up to 160,000 HP and can only be deployed once.
4010.name: Bulwark of Strength

4020.desc:
A hazardous substance spread by Arbiter: The Hermit IX during combat. 
Ships that enter the corrosive haze have their SPD reduced by 12.0% and their ACC reduced by 200.
4020.name: Corrosive Haze
